Posts.Content: Jun 17, 2014 09:53PM ricanbabe wrote: hi i am looking for answers too- i had a mastectomy on my right breast April 28th have not felt right since-i have HER2 neo positive they want to start Chemo July 3rd i have to do Chemo once a week for 3 months and then Taxpol for 12 weeks every week and then Herceptin for 52 weeks every week- does anyone else have to do this and has anyone gotten 2nd opinions? or even thought of doing alternative medicine? i am terrified of chemo cause i am just starting to feel good and now i am going to be sick for 3 mths so not happy about that at all
Posts.Title: Starting Chemo in April 2014 Kazzy115 Sunshine36
